Description: DescriptionHello, I have been selling with eBay from Japan so I can provide you the best service. PaymentPlease pay within 3 days after the auction closed.ShippingWorldwide shipping from Tokyo. However, if you want a hard case to be in cardboard, I can ship by that method if you pay additional $10.
